StreamDuo is a platform for B2B data integration. Connect back-end systems and stream data with your partners in real-time, using simple APIs

How it Works

With StreamDuo you write records to a private stream using simple APIs. Once you grant access to your partners, they can read those records using those same APIs.


A stream can be used as..

A Data Stream

The stream is ordered in time, and maintains a record of read status, allowing it to act as a streaming data source.



A Database

The stream tracks records by ID, allowing you to use it like a traditional database to read and write individual records.
